name: The war god : The artifact
description: The war god : The artifact is the first chapter of the VR series based on an ancient war hero called LanLingWang.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX980 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
